column2: "Medze me ndze su frɛ EWURADZE; Me ndze na medze yɛ nkotoserɛ ma EWURADZE."
"Muhue mo nkɔmbɔ gu n’enyim; Meda mo fona edzi kyerɛ no."
"Sɛ mo sunsum tɔ bitsi wɔ mo mu a
column3: ɔwo na ekyerɛ dza menyɛ. Ɔkwan a menam do no na woesua efir ehuntsa me."

column2: "Mohwɛɛ m’enyimfa mohwɛe; na nyimpa bi nnyi hɔ a onyim me: Guandɔbea abɔ me; nyimpa biara nndwen mo ho."

column3: ɔwo na musu frɛ wo; Mese dɛ
column5: Me kyɛfa wɔ atseasefo asaase do."

column2: "Kyɛn aso wɔ mo su do; na wɔabrɛ me adze dodow: Gye me fi m’ahohiahiafo nsa; na hɔn ho yɛ dzen sen me."

column3: ma medze ndaase ama wo dzin: Atseneneefo botwa mo ho ehyia; Osiandɛ ɔwo enye me bedzi no yie."
